_ _
- Throw: Throw a dodgeball at the opponent. If they don't Catch or Dodge, you gain a point.
_ _
- Catch: If you catch a dodgeball thrown at you, your opponent will be unable to take the next action on their list. However, if you don't catch a ball, you'll be left open, not being able to take your next action. (max 2 per round)
_ _
- Dodge: Evade a thrown dodgeball. (max 3 per round)

----------------------------------------

In Dodgeball‚Ñ¢Ô∏è, there are 3 rounds where every player submits 5 actions to do in each round. Using the actions listed above, players have to score the most points in order to win. If there is a tie, the person who dodged the least wins. If not, then the person who caught the least. If there is still a tie, the winner is chosen at random.
